node.title: Bakeoff 3: Tiny Typing
node.description: Project for 05-391 Designing Human-Centered Software. Designing a fast and accurate keyboard to work on a smart watch sized touch interface. Won first place ...

node.title: Bakeoff 4: Sensor Madness
node.description: Project for 05-391 Designing-Human Centered Software. 2-step user selection using only device sensors and no touch. Finalist in class competition.
